title: Excalibur Hotel and Casino
author: BundtCake_
pages:
The Excalibur Hotel
and Casino is a hotel
and casino (duh)
located on the Las
Vegas Strip. Named
for the mythical sword
of King Arthur, it has
a medieval castle
theming to it. When it
opened in 1990, it was
the largest hotel in
the world, with more
than 4,000 rooms.
